resources.string: Warning: Misusing the functionality of this app can have serious consequences. Using this app irresponsibly can lead to various negative outcomes, including legal troubles, damage to personal relationships, and potential harm to others. It is important to understand the potential consequences and exercise caution before engaging in such activities using "MockSMS". Please be aware that I take no responsibility for any negative outcomes resulting from the misuse of the app. Remember to use technology responsibly and consider the ethical implications of your actions. If you have any doubts or concerns, it is always advisable to seek legal or professional advice. Use the app with caution and at your own risk! Have fun, without causing harm!
SIM Slot is 0 based index, put 0 for SIM 1 and 9 for 10th SIM (pretty hypothetical). Default is 0 - SIM 1
Default is auto-generated number, not necessary.
Time difference (minute) is added to the creation time and set as receiving time, default 0. Applicable to received SMS.
SMS Status for Sent Messages, behaviour is subjected to factors.
Genuine SMS received and saved to SMS database, switch to actual SMS app to view it. (Might take few minutes to be visible)
